transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Good morning, sir.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Ji main Ashutosh baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Ji sir actually aapko call aaya tha main receive nahi kar paya tha.
Customer: Sir mere paas koi lead nahi aa rahi hai, main kya karunga?
Executive: Leads nahi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Hello? Main bol raha hun IndiaMART check kar raha hun par kisi ki lead mujhe pata nahi chal rahi hai, mujhe chahiye wo show nahi kar rahi hai.
Executive: Aapko lead show nahi kar rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji ji. Ek minute mujhe, ek minute main abhi check kar leta hun, rukiye.

Executive: Mujhe aap apni categories bataiye, yahi hai na rayon fabric, printed rayon fabric, plain rayon fabric, soft fabric.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai. Ek minute rukiye main check kar leta hun.

Executive: Mujhe ek cheez confirm karaiye sir ki leads in category se related nahi aa rahi hai ya alag lead aa rahi hai?
Customer: Category ka matlab kya hai ki mere paas jo leads aa rahi hai wo bahut se log bheje ja rahi hai. Mera kaam apna wholesale ka kaam karte hain, badi quantity mein deal karte hain.
Executive: Retail ki lead aa rahi hai?
Customer: Retail ki leads aa rahi hai, jo zyada aa rahi hai.
Executive: Jin mein aap deal karte hain un mein hi aa rahi hai na par kam wo quantity mein aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye. Ek baar main abhi check kar raha hun, line pe rahiye.


Executive: Ji mujhe bataiye ye aap se relevant hai, cotton muslim fabric.
Customer: Nahi sir.
Executive: Aapki category? Sir cambric aur rayon fabric ka hi hum log kaam karenge, cambric mein zyada hai waha pe.
Customer: Hmm. Fabric mein zyada hai aapka, rayon fabric.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Actually maine WhatsApp search kiya tha select kiya tha cambric kiya tha cotton ki jagah pe.
Executive: Ye printed rayon fabric na?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai maine issue to dekh liya kya kis wajah se hai. Ek to ye kya hai isme wrong lead consumption hua hai. Mujhe ye confirm karega in mein aap deal karte hain ya nahi. Main kuch naam bol raha hun. Jaise plain cotton fabric aur cotton grey fabric. In mein deal karte hain?
Customer: Plain cotton fabric mein deal karta hun main.
Executive: Cotton fabric mein deal karte hain?
Customer: Hmm. Ek minute rukiye aur main do teen aur naam bol raha hun.
Customer: Wo rarely hota hai kaam, mainly mera jo kaam hai printed rayon fabric ka hi hai.
Executive: Theek hai inka reason main bata deta hun kyun nahi leads aa rahi hai. Teen char point hain. Unko bata deta hun ki actually kya hai na jaise ye main category bol raha hun plain cotton fabric, cotton grey fabric aur rayon cotton fabric. In mein product add nahi hai lead consume hui hai. Is wajah se irrelevant ho jati hai leads.
Customer: Sir plain cotton to maine add karwaya na lekin isme maine photo dal di plain cotton kar ke isiliye.
Executive: Check kar leta hun main. Ek kaam kar sakte hain sir abhi? Either mobile ya desktop ya kisi pe bhi abhi main Google Meet ka link bhejta hun join kar paoge? Screen share kar paoge?
Customer: Haan screen share bilkul kar lete hain.
Executive: Theek hai main bhej raha hun, line pe rehna.

Executive: Isko aaj hi resolve kar lenge, aapko fark dikhne lagega.
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: Isko aaj hi resolve karenge abhi taki aapko fark dikhne lag jayega ek do din mein. Kyunki main category mein leads na aaye to nuksan hoga business ko.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Aur aise bhi mujhe kaafi time se ho raha hai.
Executive: Kaafi time se ho raha hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aap mujhe bata sakte hain actually kab se ye chalu hua? Kab se shuru hua?
Customer: Waise mujhe ye problem do mahine se ho rahi hai par sir kya Diwali ka time tha isliye hum log busy the hum log kaam ke chakkar mein isliye maine connect kar nahi paya aapko.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Aap dekh rahe ho main last do teen mahine se lead ko kam use kar raha hun.
Executive: Okay okay. Theek hai. Abhi main bata deta hun teen char cheeze hain unko thoda sudharna hai. Ho jayega. Usme fark dikh jayega aapko. Aap dekhiye ki Google Meet ka link aaya hoga official mail ID pe.

Customer: Haan.
Executive: Isko join kar lijiye.


[hold_music]

Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving leads.

- Receiving retail leads instead of wholesale.



Resolution:

- Executive identified wrong lead consumption.

- Executive sent Google Meet link to resolve issue.



Next Steps: 

- Issue to be resolved on Google Meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, categories, google meet, resolution
